Refactoring plan for tests\design\semantix-logo-animation\index.html:
- Extract all CSS from the HTML file
- Create new folder structure for organized CSS
- Classify CSS into logical groups
- Create separate file for each CSS group
This will improve maintainability and organization of the logo animation styles.

Successfully refactored tests/design/semantix-logo-animation/index.html:
✅ Extracted 152 lines of inline CSS into 7 modular files
✅ Created organized folder structure: css/layout/ and css/controls/
✅ Applied ultra-modular architecture pattern (same as css-refactoring-marathon)
✅ HTML reduced from 300 to 148 lines (50% reduction in inline styles)
✅ Created orchestrator pattern with css/index.css importing all modules
✅ Maintained zero breaking changes - all styling preserved

Files created:
- css/index.css (orchestrator with 20 lines)
- layout/page-layout.css (body, #logo-container)
- controls/controls-panel.css (glassmorphism panel)
- controls/controls-buttons.css (interactive buttons)
- controls/controls-sections.css (section structure)
- controls/controls-checkboxes.css (checkbox groups)
- controls/controls-sliders.css (range sliders with webkit/moz)
